title: The Fire Night Ball
description: This steamy, funny, spine-tingling debut for new adults blends erotic paranormal sex and an insightful view into contemporary women's issues. It's a spellbinder about the moral dilemma of a beautiful, successful siren who puts herself into mortal danger when her obsession with an alpha male awakens a ghost and an ancestral curse. Set in a small Western town in 1977, during the sexual revolution.
author: Anne  Carlisle
